property.name: Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Units Can Be Changed On Capture
Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
Defending Suicide and Munition Units Do Not Fire
Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
notes
property.value:
Aggression 1914

Random Set Up which takes a bit time to load.
Total 5 German subs being spawned each round in N.Atlantic, Mediterranean, Indian and Pacific Oceans.

Gameplay Features:
- Optional upkeep for units.
- Gas can take on enemy units by itself.
- Cruiser gives +1 attack power when paired with destroyers.
- Factory base productions are 10 times smaller than their territory values.
- No using captured enemy factories.
- No taking all remaining enemy incomes after capturing capitals.
- No diplomacy, national objective or tech.
- No special submarine abilities.

Countries:

Central Powers:
Germany
SFSR
Austria
Bulgaria
Senussi
Dervish
Turkey
Persia

Entente:
France
Serbia
Russia
Romania
Britain
Italy
Japan
USA

Victory Condition:
Controlling 12 capitals within 25 rounds otherwise it is considered draw.


Still in progress...
NAVALLAND 2021
